key_risks: Office sector volatility due to work-from-home trends and economic downturns
Tenant concentration risk with significant revenue dependency on a few large tenants
Leasing pressure and potential downward pressure on stock prices and dividend sustainability
controversies: Tenant allegations of unfair rent increases aimed at forcing the tenant out of business
Labor-related lawsuit (Pacia v. Kilroy Realty) highlighting potential internal governance or employment practice concerns
Legal challenges over the One Paseo mixed-use project, including lawsuits from community groups and competitors
environmental_issues: Ongoing investments in green technologies and practices may strain financial resources
social_issues: Potential reputational risks from tenant disputes and labor lawsuits
governance_issues: Legal disputes and development opposition indicating potential governance challenges
